title: GYM WEBSITE
description: A gym website is designed to serve as an online hub where you can search for exercises, exercises targeting specific muscle groups, and similar equipment. A GIF will show you how to exercise and also get some YouTube video reference. All the exercises fetched from API.

title: NETFLIX -CLONE
description: The project aims to create a user-friendly and visually appealing streaming platform where you can find movies according to different genres, with sign-in and sign-out functionality, and also purchase plans according to your preference using the Stripe payment gateway.
